Reviews.Title: “Decent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: thebeesting
Reviews.Content: Nice Hotel, good location, nice helpful staff, BUT, these days the street in front of it is closed for huge constructions ( drilling & noise ) from 6 am to 6 pm. If you want this hotel i advice you to reserve a room in high floor so you can avoid the noise & if you close your window you will hear nothing. Otherwise everything is fine & honestly if i have to come again to Istanbul , i will stay in this hotel ,but i will make sure that there is no constructions around.

Reviews.Title: “OK”
Reviews.Author: Pawel_EPWR
Reviews.Content: Extreamly helpful and polite service. Good location, near to shops, bazar and blue mosque. The room and toilet were really clean. There is no coffee/tea in the rooms. Breakfast was good with lot of choice. The pool was nice and warm. Wi-fi facility was not good. Parking was not free athough it was mentioned otherwise.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, well located, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: eastcoasttrvlr
Reviews.Content: Central location makes it a favorite of my tour director. I came in with low expectations but was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the hotel. The front desk and restaurant staff were competent, friendly and accommodating. My room was good sized and well maintained. The safe was of good size as it accommodated my laptop. The air-conditioning never failed. Bathroom amenities and the Turkish towels were superb. I could have taken a pair of towels home if they had some new ones for sale. I will definitely stay in this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “5 stars hotel for your basic needs”
Reviews.Author: ZahiBaroudi
Reviews.Content: i experienced a great stay @ this hotel, and i will definitely come back again. Strongly recommended. Great location next to the tramway station (LALELI) and very helpful staff.

Reviews.Title: “Clean well located hotel”
Reviews.Author: Massoud010
Reviews.Content: The hotel is OK, the breakfast fine, the room was good, but not too much space to put the luggage. There is a safe in the room. The TV is hardly usable. The air conditioning worked some of the time and some it didn't. There is no coffee or tea facility in the room. The staff was helpful and nice.

Reviews.Title: “not too bad, good location”
Reviews.Author: immyParis
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel my wife and I two years ago, it is not too bad, rooms are small but like ALL istanbul hotels, very basic breakfast, staff are friendly, we spent 7 nights for 183 usd so I can say that it's a very very good deal. although not near sultanahmet, the hotel is in the center of Laleli : a very commercial & shopping place, the hotel is 30 meters to the tram station, 500m to grand bazaar and 10mn by feet or 3mn by tram to sultanahmet monuments.

Reviews.Title: “poor choice of hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bonjours
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a very poor choice as it turned off the air conditionning in 30C+ temperature and the opening the windows was not an option as it is in a very noisy district of Istambul. The streets in the neighbourhood were very dirty and we were advised not to walk around at night. When complaining about the air conditioning, the management also lied to us on multiple occasions telling us that the air conditioning system was broken when it was not the case, they simply turn it off when they feel like it to save money. On the redeeming side it is relatively close to the Grand Bazar and it is clean. This hotel is not recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Ok hotel”
Reviews.Author: vizu
Reviews.Content: This inexpensive hotel caters mostly to groups/tours. I have to say it is nothing "special" but it is clean and comfortable and really posed no problem. If this hotel is proposed to you as part of deal don't hesitate it really is just fine. Nice sized room, nice large marble bathroom, a lot of renovations have been done, great indoor pool on the rooftop terrace, + sauna and hamam. Very close to the Grand Bazaar but a good 10-15 min walk to the Blue Mosque and St Sophia as well as all the best restaurants so I would have prefered to be closer to the old Istanbul even though this is considered to be in old istanbul and something more intimate. Its probably a good compromise between quality and price.
